headline.main: Rizzo, Hammel Lead Cubs to 8-0 Win of Brewers

docs.snippet: When teenagers in the Broadway audience “Of Mice and Men” have a chance to talk to the production’s stars, some of the questions are actually about the play and its meaning....
docs.lead_paragraph: When teenagers in the Broadway audience “Of Mice and Men” have a chance to talk to the production’s stars, some of the questions are actually about the play and its meaning.
docs.abstract: Actors James Franco, Chris O'Dowd and other members of cast of play Of Mice and Men meet at Longacre Theater with high school students from Pennsylvania, Connecticut and New York State to answer their questions.

headline.main: Lit Class Field Trip, Movie Star Edition
headline.print_headline: Lit Class Field Trip, Movie Star Edition

docs.snippet: Under a New York State law passed in 2011, a suspect must be observed passing out 10 or more “chica cards,” which often have a picture of a woman and a telephone number, to qualify for arrest....
docs.lead_paragraph: Under a New York State law passed in 2011, a suspect must be observed passing out 10 or more “chica cards,” which often have a picture of a woman and a telephone number, to qualify for arrest.
docs.abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column; New York State law passed in 2011 allows police officers to arrest distributors of 'chica cards,' which display pictures of females, sometimes barely clothed, and a phone number to call for delivery of prostitution services; law has drastically cut down on the number of card peddlers in Corona, Queens.

headline.main: These Cards, Though Rare, Are Not Ones for Collectors
headline.print_headline: These Cards, Though Rare, Are Not Ones for Collectors

docs.abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Giants Are Small production of H K Gruber opera Gloria--A Pig Tale, staged at the Metropolitan Museum of Art as part of the NY Phil Biennial.

headline.seo: ‘Gloria — A Pig Tale’ Brings Opera to the Met Museum

docs.snippet: The couple in the convertible sail down a pristine freeway, the pavement theirs alone. At the wheel, he smiles in suit and tie, while she leans closer, every blonde hair in place, her face a portrait of mobile bliss....
